sections.heading: What is ばかり?
sections.content:
ばかり (bakari) is a versatile particle with several related meanings, all centered around limitation or focus. Its primary meanings are "only," "nothing but," "just," "about," or "just finished."

Main uses:

Limitation - "only," "nothing but" (similar to だけ) Approximation - "about," "approximately" Repetition - "always," "keeps doing" Recent completion - "just finished"

Casual form: っぱり (ppari) or ばっか (bakka)

遊んでばかりいる。 Asonde bakari iru. "All I do is play." / "I do nothing but play." 買ったばかりだ。 Katta bakari da. "I just bought it."

children.heading: Basic limitation pattern
children.content:
Similar to だけ but with stronger nuance of excess or criticism:

Structure: [Noun/Verb-て form] + ばかり

With nouns:

肉ばかり食べる。 Niku bakari taberu. "I eat only meat." / "I eat nothing but meat." 文句ばかり言う。 Monku bakari iu. "He does nothing but complain." お金のことばかり考える。 Okane no koto bakari kangaeru. "All I think about is money."

With verbs (て-form):

寝てばかりいる。 Nete bakari iru. "All you do is sleep." 遊んでばかりいる。 Asonde bakari iru. "You do nothing but play." 食べてばかりいる。 Tabete bakari iru. "All I do is eat."

children.heading: Emphasizing repetition or excess
children.content: 同じことばかり言う。 Onaji koto bakari iu. "You keep saying the same thing." 失敗ばかりする。 Shippai bakari suru. "I keep making mistakes." / "I do nothing but fail." 文句ばかり言っている。 Monku bakari itte iru. "All you do is complain."

children.heading: Indicating approximate amounts
children.content:
Structure: [Number/Quantity] + ばかり

10個ばかり買った。 Jukko bakari katta. "I bought about 10." 一時間ばかり待った。 Ichi-jikan bakari matta. "I waited about an hour." 100人ばかり集まった。 Hyaku-nin bakari atsumatta. "About 100 people gathered." 50万円ばかりかかった。 Gojuu man-en bakari kakatta. "It cost about 500,000 yen."

Note: This usage is somewhat formal/literary.

children.heading: たばかり (ta-bakari) - Just did
children.content:
Structure: [Past tense verb] + ばかり

食べたばかりだ。 Tabeta bakari da. "I just ate." 来たばかりです。 Kita bakari desu. "I just came." / "I just arrived." 買ったばかりなのに壊れた。 Katta bakari na noni kowareta. "Even though I just bought it, it broke." 始めたばかりです。 Hajimeta bakari desu. "I just started." 会ったばかりの人。 Atta bakari no hito. "A person I just met."

children.heading: Emphasizing recency
children.content: 昨日買ったばかりだ。 Kinou katta bakari da. "I just bought it yesterday." 今起きたばかり。 Ima okita bakari. "I just woke up now." 引っ越したばかりです。 Hikkoshita bakari desu. "I just moved."

children.heading: ばかりだ - On the verge of
children.content:
